DOC.brief_title: Examining Effects Diet Health With Online Program
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately individual type 2 diabetes randomize 1:1 ratio treatment group . Classes occur online . Participants evaluate 0 , 16 , 32 week . Our main outcome interest HbA1c ( glycated hemoglobin , measure indicative blood glucose level tie diabetes severity ) .
